name: Down the Well (Krumbukt)
description:
Down the Well is a demo of a project made by Forgotten Key. It's a prototype meant to demonstrate some basic parts of a new game in a new IP where the player explores the Well Between Worlds.

The demo you can play here would at most be called an early pre-alpha version of the game we imagined we would build.

Overview

Down the Well is a game about exploring a mysterious underworld and finding purpose in it.  Throughout development we planned to explore the game's themes in deeper ways.

In this demo you can familiarize yourself a bit with the atmosphere of the world, follow Tay on a short scenario through the tunnels of the Well and have an audience with the Warden of the Forest.

Everything made here is or was very much WIP and we used it mainly to showcase the project to publishers and investors. We even have a disclaimer in the beginning of the demo from that time!

Future of the project is uncertain.

Controls

The demo can only be played properly with a controller. We recommend using an Xbox One or a PS4 controller.

The game contains in-game tutorials and will introduce the different mechanics and inputs as you progress through the demo level.
